content: the lemon and lavender socks were inspired by the colors of summer gelato flower gardens at dawn flowy summer dresses the french riviera and favorite chilly cocktails choose your favorite colors and start striping these socks are especially good for using your leftover bits and pieces the lemon and lavender socks are knitted from cuff down they are started with an optional tubular cast on which makes the cast on edge beautiful and stretchy the socks are knitted with a stripe sequence pattern the heels are worked in elongated short-row heel worked with german short row all techniques used are explained in the pattern size 1 2 3 foot circumference 17 5 20 22 5 cm / 7 8 9 inches length adjustable yarn 250-300 m / 275-350 yards of fingering weight sock yarn in main color mc and 20 m / 25 yards of fingering weight sock yarn in contrasting color cc shown with hedgehog fibres sock 90% merino 10% nylon 400 m / 437 yards per 100g in colorway ghost as mc and ginger twist studio s ginger s handdyed sheepish sock 80% wool 20% nylon 365 m / 399 yards per 100g in colorway gorblimey as cc needles 2 5 mm / us 1 5 dpns or circular needles with a cable suitable for short circumference knitting always use the needle size that gets you the right gauge gauge 32 sts and 44 rounds = 10 cm / 4 inches of stockinette stitch in the round notions 2 stitch markers waste yarn sewing needle blocking tools sock blockers
